arts.sum: Jack Diamond, Brad Hills and Kyle Wootton scored after Mallik Wilks’ opener.

arts.ttl: Jack Butland in 'end of the world' Rangers admission but Liam Kelly emergence is no apocalypse for keeper
arts.sum: Jack Butland has confessed to feeling the pressure of playing for Rangers in an interview conducted ahead of being dropped by Barry Ferguson against Athletic Bilbao

arts.ttl: Rotherham United talks over permanent appointment of 43-year-old confirmed
arts.sum: Rotherham United are considering making caretaker boss Matt Hamshaw their permanent boss, he has told the Rotherham Advertiser.… The post Rotherham United talks over permanent appointment of 43-year-old confirmed appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Ally McCoist punches Rangers air live on commentary as Ibrox hero proves he meant his Liam Kelly premonition
arts.sum: McCoist contained himself on commentary but there was a short burst of emotion which he knew was coming

arts.ttl: Liam Kelly saves penalty as 10-man Rangers hold Athletic Bilbao to thrilling draw at Ibrox
arts.sum: Rangers battled through to hold Athletic to a draw despite going down to 10 men in the opening quarter of an hour

arts.ttl: Liam Kelly the penalty hero as 10-man Rangers hold on against Athletic Bilbao
arts.sum: VAR might have its critics but it certainly creates drama. Within a quarter of an hour a review had led to the Rangers defender Robin Pröpper being dismissed, while in the second half Athletic Bilbao had a goal disallowed only to be awarded a penalty, in the same sequence of events, that was then saved. The end result was a goalless draw for Rangers to take to the Basque Country next week and the hope they can return for the Europa League final. The red card sharpened the Rangers minds as they fought to stay in the tie. They twice thought that had been snatched away when first Álex Berenguer fired in from an offside position before failing to redeem the situation from the spot. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Thursday night Rangers defy the Bilbao odds as bonkers VAR drama turns Liam Kelly into a hero – 5 talking points
arts.sum: After a tumultuous 90 minutes plus 12-added on the Ibrox roar was back to greet a lion-hearted performance

Stockport's late surge probably isn't going to be enough for an automatic spot but three wins on the bounce have all-but sealed their place in the top six. The Hatters need just eight points from the...
